General.Name: Zoje Resources Investment Co Ltd
General.Description: Zoje Resources Investment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of industrial sewing machines in China. It offers lockstitch, overlock, interlock, zigzag sewing machines, pattern, heavy, and special sewing machines. The company was formerly known as Zoje Sewing Machine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zoje Resources Investment Co., Ltd. in November 2014. Zoje Resources Investment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Yuhuan, China.
General.Address: No. 198, Xinggang East Road, Yuhuan, China, 317604
